page.description: Push a button from a script.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.PUSH() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.PUSH() Description The &ltOBJECT>.PUSH() method applies to:
Form Controls (for &ltOBJECT> use the &ltCONTROL> pointer or the address of the control) The &ltOBJECT>.PUSH() method triggers the button's OnPush event. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example The following script executes the script under button1 when its value is "Adams". if dropkeyl1.value = "Adams" then button1.push() end if
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
